summary: Because who said the Dovahkiin can\'t be a purple eyed teenager? Couldn\'t find any similar uploads so I decided to share (:
descriptionHtml:
Incase her features bother anyone ( And they will ), lets just say it\'s the Dragon\'s blood mixed with ancient Akaviri ancestry. It\'s why she has nicer skin than everyone else.  Right? Riiighht??

I picked a Breton for the smaller build, but incase you prefer Nords/Imperials or don\'t wanna restart I have included screenshots of the sliders. I think they share the same sliders.





MODS REQUIRED:


Coverwomen Look 3
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563

Purple Eyes
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1763

Detailed Lips ( Install after Coverwomen)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=689

Telthalions Finer Hair Standard
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2207



Additional Recommendations ( Not required) :

Coolsim hair pack + Non-shiny Retexture ( For some pretty, contemporary hairstyles !)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809 and http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4400


Caliente\'s Female Body Mod ( Blends with Coverwomen, and alot of cool outfits are designed to support it. )

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666


High Quality Eyes ( Incase you don\'t like purple eyes, they can be hard to see sometimes. I personally have both installed and change eye colors depending on my mood! Make sure you install Xenius\'s mod first. )

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=498


No Helmet Mod ( So you can see her face w/o losing out on helmet stats )

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=562


EQUIPMENT MODS I USED FOR SCREENSHOTS:

Nightingale Prime + Killer Keo\'s Skimpy CBBE ( It looks more youthful and carefree than original)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1896 and http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654

HD Blades Armor + Muramasa
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4480 and http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4232



In case you were tweaking her with showracemenu and lost her original colours...

Cheek colour +1
Forehead +1
Lips +1


Enjoy and comment/criticize
author: Tsixth
